Package it.unipr.ce.dsg.deus.core

Interface Summary
SchedulerListener This interface is used to implement a listening method that event can use to be notified when one of their referenced event is scheduled for the execution.
 

Class Summary
AutomatorParser This class is responsible for handling the simulation configuration file according to the DEUS xml schema.
Deus  
Engine This class represents the simulation engine of DEUS.
Event The Event class represents the simulation object being scheduled by the Engine.
Node The Node class represents the "entity" inside the simulation.
NodeEvent Abstract class for all the Events which exist if and only if they are associated with a Node.
Process The Process class represents the simulation object responsible to determine the timing of events scheduling.
Resource This class represent the generic resource associated to a node.
SimulationObject Class used to abstract each simulation object, adding the member and methods to support the logging process.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidParamsException This class represents the exceptions thrown in case the parameters passed to simulation objects are wrong.
RunException This class represents the exceptions thrown in case the run method of simulation events fails.
SimulationException This class represents the exceptions thrown in case one of the components into the simulation fails its execution.
